Documentation

Region Capture

Precision region selection with magnifier, window detection, and multi-region support.

Start capture

Press F2 (default) to enter Region Capture. The cursor switches to crosshair and a magnifier panel appears.

Selection behavior

Precision targeting

  • Magnifier provides pixel-level feedback
  • Width and height are shown near the selection
  • Hold Shift to constrain aspect ratio

Window-aware selection

When window detection is available, SnapTray can detect the window under the cursor so you can select it with one click.

Cancel and retry

Right-click or press Esc to cancel current selection.

Multi-region workflow

Press M to toggle multi-region capture mode. You can collect multiple regions, then export combined or separate outputs.

Useful shortcuts

Action Shortcut
Start Region Capture F2
Constrain ratio Hold Shift
Toggle multi-region M
Start recording from region R
Cancel Esc

Next step

Go to Annotation Tools to edit captures before save/copy.

SnapTray

Desktop-grade screenshot and recording workflows, designed for speed and clarity.

Made with Qt 6 and C++17
